description:
Chopper and Carrot are captured by Brulee and strung up for dinner! But Chopper sees a chance to free himself! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro launch a plan to reach the Ponegliffs - a daring game of chance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angriff auf das Château! – Schnappt euch das Road Porneglyph!
Infiltración dentro del castillo. Robar el road poneglyph
Infiltrati nel castello. Il furto del Road Poignee Griffe
Infiltration du château. Atteindre le road ponéglyphe !
Invading the Chateau! Reach the Road Ponegliff!
Проникновение в Замок! Добраться до Понеглифа-указателя!
غزو القصر! الوصول إلى بونيغليف الطّريق!
城内[シャトー]潜入 奪え! ロード歴史の本文[ポーネグリフ]
